data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_utilization IS NULL OR cpu_utilization < 85) AND (freeable_memory IS NULL OR freeable_memory > 0)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node FACET amazon_elasticache_cache_node_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_elasticache_cache_node_name) AS 'Cache Nodes' FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node FACET region

presentation.title: Region Distribution
presentation.notes: The AWS Region this object belongs to.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_elasticache_cache_node_name) AS 'Cache Nodes' FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node FACET availability_zone

presentation.title: Availability Zone Distribution
presentation.notes: The Availability Zone where this node was created and now resides.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_utilization) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(cache_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cache Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of successful key lookups.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(swap_usage) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Swap Usage (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The amount of swap used on the host.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(freeable_memory) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Freeable Memory (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The amount of free memory available on the host.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(storage_space_used) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Storage Space Used (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The total amount of space allocated by Redis.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cas_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CAS Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of CAS requests the cache has received where the requested key was found and the CAS value matched.

data.nrql: SELECT average(touch_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Touch Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of keys that have been touched and were given a new expiration time.

data.nrql: SELECT average(get_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Get Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of get requests the cache has received where the key requested was found.

data.nrql: SELECT average(delete_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Delete Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of delete requests the cache has received where the requested key was found.

data.nrql: SELECT average(increment_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Increment Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of increment requests the cache has received where the key requested was found.

data.nrql: SELECT average(decrement_hit_rate) FROM amazon_elasticache_cache_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Decrement Hit Rate (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percent of decrement requests the cache has received where the requested key was found.
